body: The udunits package is produced by UCAR Unidata. The [Spack package definition](https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/udunits/package.py#L13) uses a URL that points to www.gfd-dennou.org. This site seems to be completely unrelated to UCAR, and most of its information pages are only in Japanese. Also, the package versions in the package.py file do not correspond to files available on either UCAR's [download page](https://artifacts.unidata.ucar.edu/service/rest/repository/browse/downloads-udunits/) or on gfd-dennou.org. Spack is getting these from its AWS mirrors, and these old versions fail to build on recent macOS releases.
title: Installation issue: udunits package source is very odd
